page.title: 13Country Businesses
page.content: Few people have chosen to start new businesses in this area. Two exceptions are Mr King and Mr Walker. Mr King's painting and decorating business has been going for 21 years, but it is only seven years since he took over the old chapel in Scalford as the base for his 21 man business. Mr Walker set up his screen printing business in Wycomb, where he works alone, only five years ago. Both men agree that it would be easier to run their firms from the town, though Mr Walker says it is very convenient to work at home.They both travel some distance in running their businesses. Mr Walker says he is happy most of the time, for he feels he earns a fair amount of money for work he enjoys doing. He does admit however that his job gets a bit boring if there is a repetitive order to do.
